config.fixed-levels.title: Fixed Levels Configuration
config.fixed-levels.option.useCustomExpL: Enables custom exp levels. Disable to use vanilla calculations.
config.fixed-levels.option.baseXPForOneL: The amount of exp to go from level 0 to level 1. If curve mode is off, this amount is for every level.
config.fixed-levels.option.curveModeTool: Curve mode calculation is XPToNextLevel = (baseXPForOneLevel + (experienceLevel * curveModeMultiplier)).
config.fixed-levels.option.curveModeMult: The multiplier used in the curve mode calculation.
config.fixed-levels.option.useExpCapTool: When enabled, limits the amount of exp needed for the next level for vanilla and custom curve mode.
config.fixed-levels.option.maxExpForNext: This sets the max amount of exp needed for the next level if using vanilla or custom curve mode.
